text: The Ansgar's Church () was a church building in Vättersnäs in the town of Jönköping in Sweden. It belonged to the Uniting Church in Sweden. It was inaugurated on 17 October 1965. The church was destroyed by a fire on 3 August 2021. According to a police report published on 12 August the same year a lightning strike caused the fire. This conclusion has later been questioned. No thunder was recorded by the SMHI witnesses claimed to have noticed firework explosions. ==References== ==Other websites== *official website Category:Churches in Sweden Category:Buildings and structures in Jönköping
title: Ansgar's Church
